/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC   -shared -Wl,-soname,libJNvPTXCompiler-11.8.0-linux-aarch64.so -o ../../nativeLibraries/linux/aarch64/lib/libJNvPTXCompiler-11.8.0-linux-aarch64.so CMakeFiles/JNvPTXCompiler.dir/src/JNvPTXCompiler.cpp.o  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -lrt -ldl /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnvptxcompiler_static.a ../../../lib/libJCudaCommonJNI.a -lcuda /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnvrtc.so
